name: Viarentals
overview:
Viarentals.com connects guests to owners, for any kind of rental, it might be short or long term, for any kind of property: houses, villas, apartments or even house boats!

Viarentals.com is great for both proprietor and renter boasting many advantages having been thoroughly tried and tested before itâ€™s launch resulting in a sophisticated and well designed website, paving the way for outstanding customer satisfaction.

Home owners can use Viarentals.com to advertise their rental properties at no cost and commission free and only pay the subscription flat fee of 99 Euros, once an inquiry has been made on a property. The step by step guide enables the proprietor to publish a well structured advert in many different languages and in just a few easy minutes. It gives tips on how to make the most your advertisement, making your listing hassle free and fast leading towards greater interest in your rental lodgings.

For those looking for the best deal on vacation rentals, Viarentals.com has a vast range of properties from villas and studios to mill houses all over the world suiting every taste and budget for the perfect rental. Itâ€™s very use-friendly due to the professional and elegant design, clearly laying out each listing, including numerous images and maps to take you closer to the desired rental. Thanks to the direct owner contact function and quality control team, who give great importance to customer feedback, renters can be assured of the quality and authenticity of the properties and proprietors listed. As it is free to consult and easy to navigate, furnished holiday rentals are just a few clicks away.

For more information, please visit www.viarentals.com
